channel.title: Constant Crash Bug - Office Complex
channel.description: The bug occurs during the very first segment of Office Complex. If you turn on the flashlight while in the first vent section, the game will crash. Here are my specs, plus the bug reports. AMD Phenom II x6 1090T nVidia GTS 450 4 GB RAM Thanks! Addition: It also seems to crash point blank if you turn it on at all in the first section. I'll continue playing to another segment to see if the problem persists. EDIT: The bug now seems to be random, at least for me. I just received the same bug at We've Got Hostiles part 3. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T19_43_37C0.mdmp (110 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T19_45_13C0.mdmp (112 KB)

item.title: Constant Crash Bug - Office Complex
item.dc:creator: HazDS
item.description:
I managed to get the part that kept crashing by lowering my shadow settings, just a heads up for anyone having the same issue.

item.title: Constant Crash Bug - Office Complex
item.dc:creator: DaftMink
item.description:
litiumjon:

Sometimes i have experienced framerate drops when i turn on the flashlight.

That’s not Black Mesa that’s Valve and there new flashlight.
Before the Half-Life 2 update it worked fine, then after it got laggy. :’(

Read full topic

item.title: Constant Crash Bug - Office Complex
item.dc:creator: litiumjon
item.description:
I have the same issue… Sometimes i have experienced framerate drops when i turn on the flashlight.
Other than that and some other small things. Great mod!!

My specs:
AMD Phenom II x6 1075T
Radeon hd 6850
12Gb ram (1600)
Vertex 2 60Gb SSD (C

item.title: Constant Crash Bug - Office Complex
item.dc:creator: dannydork
item.description:
dannydork:

Addition: It also seems to crash point blank if you turn it on at all in the first section. I’ll continue playing to another segment to see if the problem persists.

Yep, the bug disappeared as soon as I moved on to part 2. If I have spare time, I’ll go back to Part 1 and see if the bug replicates.

Read full topic

item.title: Constant Crash Bug - Office Complex
item.dc:creator: dannydork
item.description:
The bug occurs during the very first segment of Office Complex. If you turn on the flashlight while in the first vent section, the game will crash. Here are my specs, plus the bug reports.

AMD Phenom II x6 1090T
nVidia GTS 450
4 GB RAM

Thanks!

Addition: It also seems to crash point blank if you turn it on at all in the first section. I’ll continue playing to another segment to see if the problem persists.

EDIT: The bug now seems to be random, at least for me. I just received the same bug at We’ve Got Hostiles part 3.
